note.p: Share-agent. So-called ‘Manager for the provinces’ based in Liverpool for the Artizans, Labourers, & General Dwellings Co. Living in Chorlton on Medlock, Manchester, 1871.
Correspondence vol. 20, letter from J. R. Martin, 27 March 1872
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/2162/444/7), 1871 (RG10/3993/172/65), 1881 (RG11/1026/65/47), 1891 (RG12/764/110/3)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 21 November 2017)
